Name: ":ref:`Exchange transaction <02_decentralchain/03_transaction:Exchange Transaction>`"
Description: "Exchanges two different tokens between two accounts. Contains two counter orders: a buy order and a sell order."

Name: ":ref:`data transaction <02_decentralchain/03_transaction:Data Transaction>`"
column4: modifies and deletes data entries in the sender's account data storage."

Name: ":ref:`set script transaction <02_decentralchain/03_transaction:Set Script Transaction>`"
Description: "Assigns the dApp script or account script to the sender's account."

Name: ":ref:`invoke script transaction <02_decentralchain/03_transaction:Invoke Script Transaction>`"
Description: "Invokes a callable function of a dApp."
